reserve"}},"enableReserveStableBorrowRate(address)":{"details":"enable stable rate borrowing on a reserve","params":{"_reserve":"the address of the reserve*"}},"freezeReserve(address)":{"details":"freezes a reserve. nodes.documentation: @dev refreshes the lending pool core configuration to update the cached address*
nodes.name: refreshLendingPoolCoreConfiguration

disableReserveStableBorrowRate(address).details: disable stable rate borrowing on a reserve

params._stableBorrowRateEnabled: true if stable borrow rate needs to be enabled by default on this reserve*

enableReserveAsCollateral(address,uint25.details: enables a reserve to be used as collateral

params._baseLTVasCollateral: the loan to value of the asset when used as collateral
params._liquidationBonus: the bonus liquidators receive to liquidate this asset*
params._liquidationThreshold: the threshold at which loans using this asset as collateral will be considered undercollateralized

enableReserveStableBorrowRate(address).details: enable stable rate borrowing on a reserve

freezeReserve(address).details: freezes a reserve. A freezed reserve doesn't accept any new deposit, borrow or rate swap, but can accept repayments, liquidations, rate rebalances and redeems

params._interestRateStrategyAddress: the address of the interest rate strategy contract for this reserve*
params._reserve: the address of the reserve to be initialized
params._underlyingAssetDecimals: the decimals of the reserve underlying asset

initReserveWithData(address,string,strin.details: initializes a reserve using aTokenData provided externally (useful if the underlying ERC20 contract doesn't expose name or decimals)

params._aTokenName: the name of the aToken contract
params._aTokenSymbol: the symbol of the aToken contract
params._interestRateStrategyAddress: the address of the interest rate strategy contract for this reserve*
params._reserve: the address of the reserve to be initialized
params._underlyingAssetDecimals: the decimals of the reserve underlying asset

refreshLendingPoolCoreConfiguration().details: refreshes the lending pool core configuration to update the cached address*

removeLastAddedReserve(address).details: removes the last added reserve in the list of the reserves

setReserveBaseLTVasCollateral(address,ui.details: emitted when a reserve loan to value is updated

params._ltv: the new value for the loan to value*

setReserveInterestRateStrategyAddress(ad.details: sets the interest rate strategy of a reserve

params._rateStrategyAddress: the new address of the interest strategy contract*

setReserveLiquidationBonus(address,uint2.details: updates the liquidation bonus of a reserve

params._bonus: the new value for the liquidation bonus*

setReserveLiquidationThreshold(address,u.details: updates the liquidation threshold of a reserve.

params._threshold: the new value for the liquidation threshold*

userdoc.notice: Executes configuration methods on the LendingPoolCore contract. Allows to enable/disable reserves, and set different protocol parameters.*
